definition: Lai Changxing (1958-), notorious Xiamen mafia boss involved in large scale corruption and smuggling, extradited from Canada back to China in 2008
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: Lai, Jinjiang, Fujian, Xiamen smuggling case of a principal.
sentences.chinese: 赖昌星，福建晋江人，厦门某特大走私案主犯。

definition: Henry Ying-tung Fok (1913-2006), Hong Kong tycoon with close PRC connections
Qincheng Prison, maximum-security prison located about 30 km north of central Beijing, whose inmates include former high-level officials convicted of corruption
lit. to get shackled and thrown in jail (idiom)/fig. to be put behind bars/to get jailed
Sir Li Ka-shing (1928-), Hong Kong businessman
Du Yuesheng (1888-1951), Shanghai secret-society leader, banker, industrialist
to go to jail/to be sent to prison
Zhou Yongkang (1942-), PRC petroleum engineer and politician
Bo Xilai (1949-), PRC politician, appointed to the Politburo in 2007, sentenced in 2013 to life imprisonment for corruption and misconduct
